definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: But theorists hold different viewpoints on the origin of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 但學術界在唯物史觀誕生標誌問題上，一直都有分歧。

sentences.english: Marxs theory of social forms is the important part of the historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 社會形態理論是馬克思唯物史觀的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Scientific productivity theory is the foundation of Marxism materialist conception of history.
sentences.chinese: 科學的生產力理論是馬克思主義唯物史觀的基礎。

sentences.english: The research on the civilian community helped Mark set the starting point of the theroy of historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思以市民社會入手來確立唯物史觀的理論起點。

sentences.english: The study of the civil society has great significance in the foundation of the historical materialism.
sentences.chinese: 市民社會的研究對唯物史觀的形成具有重要意義。

sentences.english: Antonio Labriola expounded on the historical materialism is creative.
sentences.chinese: 拉布里奧拉對唯物史觀的闡發是富有創造性的。

sentences.english: Engels pointed out that historical materialism is not only the world outlook but also the methodology.
sentences.chinese: 恩格斯指出，唯物史觀不僅是世界視，而且是方法論。

sentences.english: The naissance course of historical materialism in the foundation course of historical epistemology.
sentences.chinese: 唯物史觀的誕生過程表現爲歷史認識論的確立過程。

sentences.english: Historical materialism is a great finding of Mark.
sentences.chinese: 唯物史觀是馬克思的偉大發現。

sentences.english: This reflects the whole history of the early Tang dynasty in the nation's progressive view of history.
sentences.chinese: 這從整體上反映了唐初史學中民族史觀的進步性。

sentences.english: In his On the Spirit of Law, Montesqieu expounded his concept of social history.
sentences.chinese: 孟德斯鳩在《論法的精神》中表述了他的社會歷史觀。

sentences.english: Marx constructing historical materialism is the apotheosis of theory innovation in human anamnesis history.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思創立唯物史觀是人類思想史上理論創新的典範。

sentences.english: Movies are dedicated to the historical dramas that shape our view on history.
sentences.chinese: 電影則致力於能改變人們歷史觀唸的歷史劇作。

sentences.english: Nietzsche's view of history is tightly connected to the Lebensphilosophie.
sentences.chinese: 尼采的歷史觀是和生命哲學緊密相聯的。

sentences.english: Historical materialism of Marxism is the theoretical basis of supervision by the masses.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義唯物史觀是羣衆監督的理論基礎。

sentences.english: Rousseau's conception of history has surpassed that of his predecessors and his contemporary thinkers.
sentences.chinese: 盧梭的社會歷史觀超越了前人及其同時代思想家。

definition: May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
to sinicize/to take on Chinese characteristics
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
